title: Gallery Talk: The Art of Noise with Wolfgang Voigt — CANCELLED
hero_caption: <p>Andy Warhol. <em>Self-Portrait</em>, 1966. Gift of Edlis|Neeson Collection. © 2018 The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc. / Artists Rights So …
description:
This program has been cancelled. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Wolfgang Voigt, a leading pioneer in electronic music, discusses the influence of Andy Warhol and other visual artists on his practice.

Presented with the Empty Bottle

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
